data.description:
Immerse yourself in the world of healthcare training and awareness with the Immertec app. This powerful platform allows you to observe live surgical procedures performed by expert surgeons, no matter where you are in the world. Step into the virtual operating room and take a front-row seat, witnessing the intricate details of each procedure unfold before your eyes.

The Immertec app goes beyond passive observation by offering up to 4 additional medical feeds that you can customize to suit your preferences. Focus on what's most important to you during case observations, whether it's a specific angle, technique, or instrument. This personalized viewing experience ensures that you make the most of every surgical observation, tailoring it to your learning needs.

But Immertec doesn't stop at observation alone. It enables real-time communication and collaboration, allowing you to connect with the surgeon inside the operating room and engage with your peers who are attending remotely. Seamlessly exchange insights, ask questions, and gain a deeper understanding of the procedures as you collaborate with experts and fellow healthcare professionals.

Elevate your training and awareness in an immersive environment that replicates the real-world operating room experience. Expand your knowledge, sharpen your skills, and stay at the forefront of medical advancements, all from the convenience of your Oculus device. Take your healthcare education to new heights with Immmertec.

changelog.change_log:
Release Note Update - Version 1.1.197

We're excited to announce the latest update to our platform, addressing several issues and introducing new features to enhance your experience.

Fixed Issues:
Resolved an issue that prevented the controllers from interacting with UI when using a Meta Quest 3 headset.

Improvements:
Implemented numerous general bug fixes and code optimizations, enhancing stability and performance throughout the application.

We're committed to continuously improving our platform, and this update reflects our dedication to providing you with the best possible experience. Thank you for your continued support and feedback.

Release Note Update - Version 1.1.182

We're excited to announce the latest update to our platform, addressing several issues and introducing new features to enhance your experience.

Fixed Issues:
Resolved an issue that prevented the event list from loading in some cases.
Resolved an issue that caused the webcam overlay in Presenter Mode to display as a black image if the user's headset was idle for an extended period of time.

We're committed to continuously improving our platform, and this update reflects our dedication to providing you with the best possible experience. Thank you for your continued support and feedback.

Release Note Update - Version 1.1.174

We're excited to announce the latest update to our platform, addressing several issues and introducing new features to enhance your experience.

New Features:
Added support for Presenter Mode.

Improvements:
Implemented numerous general bug fixes and code optimizations, enhancing stability and performance throughout the application.

We're committed to continuously improving our platform, and this update reflects our dedication to providing you with the best possible experience. Thank you for your continued support and feedback.

Release Note Update - Version 1.1.125

We're excited to announce the latest update to our platform, addressing several issues and introducing new features to enhance your experience.

Fixed Issues:
Resolved an issue causing some users to not appear correctly in the live event user list.

New Features:
Added a logout confirmation window to prevent accidentally signing out of the user's account.

Improvements:
Implemented numerous general bug fixes and code optimizations, enhancing stability and performance throughout the application.

We're committed to continuously improving our platform, and this update reflects our dedication to providing you with the best possible experience. Thank you for your continued support and feedback.

Release Note Update - Version 1.1.119

We're excited to announce the latest update to our platform, addressing several issues and introducing new features to enhance your experience.

Fixed Issues:
Resolved an issue causing certain overlays to fail to spawn correctly, ensuring smoother navigation and usage across the platform.

New Features:
Added support for overlay titles in streamed recordings, improving the overall viewing experience.

Improvements:
Implemented numerous general bug fixes and code optimizations, enhancing stability and performance throughout the application.

We're committed to continuously improving our platform, and this update reflects our dedication to providing you with the best possible experience. Thank you for your continued support and feedback.
